abstract: The Japanese government will ask the European Union to block BHP Billiton‘s bid to take over Rio Tinto, on concerns that the deal would have an adverse effect on the country’s domestic steel market, Jiji Press reported.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese government will ask the European Union to block BHP Billiton‘s bid to take over Rio Tinto, on concerns that the deal would have an adverse effect on the country’s domestic steel market, Jiji Press reported.

headline.main: Japan to Ask EU to Block BHP’s Rio Bid, Report Says
